Demonstration of sfc to sf conversion:

```{r}
asia = world[world$continent == "Asia", ]
asia = st_union(asia)
class(asia)
asia_df = st_sf(
  data.frame(name = "asia"),
  geometry = asia
  )
class(asia_df)
```
